title: IF ANYONE SEES THIS LINK DO NOT CLICK IT
body:
event: **[LINK REMOVED]**

If anyone gets sent this link by anyone. DO NOT CLICK IT. it also comes with the words (((free rp 2000))). It is spam and if you fill out your details, your account will get logged in somewhere else and someone will send this to all your friedns in the friend list.

I have covered the last 6 digits with * as so no-one accidentally clicks it. But i still know the numbers.

replies.body: Got this from a friend too. Could tell from the link its a phising page..

Yeah this. I don't even click on links from my brothers on steam. And we live in the same house. I only click links if i am in voice chat with them and they confirm they personally sent it. 

If you just click random links TBH you deserve to lose your account or more.

this one looks important and I got it from a reliable source. You may want to pass this info along to your female friends and to your male friends, who can alert their wives or girlfriends".

 WARNING !!!!!

 If a man comes to your front door and says he is conducting a survey and he asks you to show him your tits,

DO NOT SHOW HIM YOUR TITS.

This is a scam and he is only trying to SEE YOUR tits.

I wish someone had told me this before (I feel so stupid.)

Hi Grandpa YI,

Thanks for bringing this to everyone's attention, but  could you** please remove the link** so nobody accidentally clicks it? Maybe just identify it as {loginsiteswebs}. 

Make sure that if you see the link commented anywhere on the boards/news items to report it ASAP using the report feature in the bottom right corner. ♥
Thank you i have done just that.

You have not, the link still remains. Please remove the link so other players do not click it and log in by mistake.

As stated by Yaia it would be better if you just replaced it with something simple ie; {loginsiteswebs}
